################################################
#  Barenaked Ladies on The Big Bang Theory.mkv #
################################################
LWLibavVideoSource("F:\The Big Bang Theory S04 Blu-ray 1080p AVC DTS-HDMA5.1-sony188\Disc2\BDMV\STREAM\00035.m2ts")
TFM().TDecimate()

ConditionalFilter(FixChroma().FixDirtyLines().FillMargins(1, 0, 1, 0).BalanceBorders(0, 0, 2, 2), last, "SceneType", "==", "1")
ConditionalReader("F:\Encode\TBBT\BL_00035.txt", "SceneType")

Spline36Resize(1280, 720)

ConditionalFilter(FillMargins(1, 0, 0, 0).BalanceBorders(0, 0, 2, 0), last, "SceneType", "==", "2")

################################################
#  Others                                      #
################################################
LWLibavVideoSource("F:\The Big Bang Theory S04 Blu-ray 1080p AVC DTS-HDMA5.1-sony188\Disc1\BDMV\STREAM\00000.m2ts")
FixChroma()
FixDirtyLines()
FillMargins(1, 0, 1, 0)
BalanceBorders(0, 0, 2, 2)
Spline36Resize(1280, 720)

Function FixChroma(clip c)
{
    r56 = c.Crop(1914, 0, -4, 0)
    r78 = c.Crop(1912, 0, -6, 0)
    fixed = Overlay(c, StackHorizontal(r78, r78, r56, r56), x=1912)
    
    return mt_merge(c, fixed, fixed, Y=2, U=4, V=5)
}

Function FixDirtyLines(clip c)
{
    fixed = c
    
    Left = fixed.Crop(0, 0, 8, 0)
    l1 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.00).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(0, 0, -7, 0)
    l2 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.30).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(1, 0, -6, 0)
    l3 = Left.Tweak(cont=0.95).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(2, 0, -5, 0)
    l4 = Left.Tweak(cont=0.97).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(3, 0, -4, 0)
    l5 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.02).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(4, 0, -3, 0)
    l6 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.00).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(5, 0, -2, 0)
    l7 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.00).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(6, 0, -1, 0)
    l8 = Left.Tweak(cont=1.02).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(7, 0, 0, 0)
    fixed = Overlay(fixed, StackHorizontal(l1, l2, l3, l4, l5, l6, l7, l8).ConvertToYV12())
    
    Right = fixed.Crop(1914, 0, 0, 0)
    r1 = Right.Tweak(cont=1.00).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(5, 0, 0, 0)
    r2 = Right.Tweak(cont=1.30).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(4, 0, -1, 0)
    r3 = Right.Tweak(cont=0.95).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(3, 0, -2, 0)
    r4 = Right.Tweak(cont=1.02).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(2, 0, -3, 0)
    r5 = Right.Tweak(cont=1.02).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(1, 0, -4, 0)
    r6 = Right.Tweak(cont=0.98).ConvertToRGB24().Crop(0, 0, -5, 0)
    fixed = Overlay(fixed, StackHorizontal(r6, r5, r4, r3, r2, r1).ConvertToYV12(), x=1914)
    
    return fixed
}
title: TBBT.S04-iNK
